Pre-Game Insights: Portland will attempt to end its seven-game road slide when the Trail Blazers face Milwaukee.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Trail Blazers are 3-14 on the road.
The Bucks are 11-6 in home games.
The Bucks are shooting 47.7% from the field this season, 0.4 percentage points lower than the 48.1% the Trail Blazers allow to opponents.
Giannis Antetokounmpo is averaging 32.4 points, 11.7 rebounds, six assists and 1.5 blocks for the Bucks.
Jerami Grant is scoring 15.0 points per game and averaging 3.6 rebounds for the Trail Blazers.
Others: The Trail Blazers have a 3-2 record in games decided by 3 points or fewer.
The Bucks have a 9-7 record in games decided by 10 points or more.
Portland has a 3-2 record in games decided by 3 points or fewer.
The Trail Blazers are shooting 44.5% from the field, 0.7% lower than the 45.2% the Bucks' opponents have shot this season.
